product.text:
Brer Rabbit Gets Tricked

Uncle Remus’ humorous tales of adventure, trickery, and life lessons have enchanted young readers for decades. In this delightful Disney reprise, Brer Turtle surprises clever Brer Rabbit by outwitting him in a race. Brer Rabbit learns from his mistake, using a few newfound tricks to hoodwink Brer Wolf, Brer Bear, and Brer Fox. This humorous tale is sure to bring a laugh, and will also encourage critical thinking by showing the reader that things aren’t always as they appear.

Tie-in Activity: Ask your child to list examples of trickery in the story. Then talk with him about the differences between harmless and hurtful tricks. Present some examples of how trickery and deceit can cause hurt feelings or, in extreme cases, bodily harm.
